attributes.action: Uphold the convention where the speaker of the house's seat is uncontested
attributes.background: This government wishes to break the convention where the speaker of the house's seat is uncontested at a General Election. We, the undersigned, call that this convention is upheld by the current government at any upcoming election to ensure the continuity of scrutiny during the Brexit process.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for political parties rather than the Government or Parliament as a whole.

The current Speaker of the House of Commons has announced his intention to step down at the next election or on 31 October 2019, whichever is sooner.
